It is an innate human feeling, and anyone who claims they have none is lying or castrated

However to avoid it, simply stay away from its triggers. If you're the weak minded, no focus, no goals, no self-respect, follows half-naked women type of person, of course you fall into it https://t.co/VX0ci1ZKP7

Social media making it easily accessible while also encouraging promiscuity from women is what makes those who fall in weaker each time.

Practical actions for are to stay busy, avoid places that encourage it, fast to diminish it's strength. And the best, if you can, get married. https://t.co/2CU8Z7OWwj

Some women came to Aesha Radhi Allaahu Anha wearing thin clothing (i.e revealing what is beneath)

She said:
“If you are (truly) believers, then this is not the garment of believing women. And if you are disbelievers then (you may) enjoy it” https://t.co/nQ1J8s3Lag

Why are you wasting your time with someone you’ve never even met?

Why do you even care what someone random says about you?

Let the dogs bark.

In person, if a dog barks—you can always put it down.

إلى أهلنا الكرد؛ لا تصدقوا روايات الفتنة، من يمسكم بسوء فهو خصيمنا، نريد لسورية صلاحها وتنميتها ووحدتها.

نعلن عن إصدار مرسوم خاص يضمن حقوقكم وخصوصياتكم لتكون مصونة بنص القانون، ونفتح باب العودة الآمنة والمشاركة الكاملة في بناء وطن واحد يتسع لجميع أبنائه. https://t.co/yxGCsbmnht

Be patient and content with Allah’s decree as your provision will surely come. 

It is best to remain unmarried than to marry someone who would make your life a living hell!

Shaytān to those who obeyed him:

“I had no authority over you, except that I invited you and you accepted my call. So, do not blame me, but blame yourselves.” (Q. 14 : 22)

أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا إِلَى الطَّيْرِ فَوْقَهُمْ صَافَّاتٍ وَيَقْبِضْنَ مَا يُمْسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا الرَّحْمَنُ إِنَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ بَصِيرٌ

Being a Muslim is fun just blame every bad thing on shaytan or nazar and move on!

Your wife has the most right to good behaviour, and having the best manners to them, because she is the one who is with you day and night, openly and secretly.

If you are afflicted with something she is afflicted along with you, and if you are happy, she is happy along with you,

Do not be discouraged from the congregational prayer just because you may be late

The Messenger ﷺ
"Whoever catches a raka'ah from the prayer, then he has caught the prayer"
[Narrated Bukhārī and Muslim]

I.e He gets the reward for praying in congregation

In the Shafi'i madhab one is also considered to have caught it if he makes it before the Imam gives the tasleem (salaam)

However others say one must catch the final ruku' (with takbeerat ul-ihram as some usually forget and this is a pillar)
https://t.co/7PMAtq5t5l

Jummah reminder ❤️ :
1)Read Surah Al-Kahf 
2) apply perfume 
3) listen to the khutba attentively 
4) Send salawat upon the prophet (ﷺ )
5) Make dua during last hour of sunset 
6) keep our opressed brothers and sisters in your duas
